body_html:
I use pytorch 0.4.1 .But actually it's not the problem of version.
The real murder is below:

data = getBatchData((Q, Q_len, A, A_len, C, C_len, Sess_len, start_label, end_label))
while True:
temp_data = next(data ,None)
if temp_data is None:
break
#inner_loop_iter += 1
inner_loop_iter += batch_size
Q, Q_len, A, A_len, C, C_len, Sess_len, start_label, end_label = temp_data
OtherInpus = (Q , C , Q_len , Sess_len , C_len)

these variable names has been reassigned in the while loop
Q, Q_len, A, A_len, C, C_len, Sess_len, start_label, end_label

body:
I use pytorch 0.4.1 .But actually  it's not the problem of version.
The real murder is below:
==========
data = getBatchData((Q, Q_len, A, A_len, C, C_len, Sess_len, start_label, end_label))
        while True:
            temp_data = next(data ,None)
            if temp_data is None:
                break
            #inner_loop_iter += 1
            inner_loop_iter += batch_size
            Q, Q_len, A, A_len, C, C_len, Sess_len, start_label, end_label = temp_data
            OtherInpus = (Q , C , Q_len , Sess_len , C_len)
=================
these variable names has been reassigned in the while loop
Q, Q_len, A, A_len, C, C_len, Sess_len, start_label, end_label
